# sse_application (Data Source)

Fetches a single Application by name (label).

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Find a specific application by name
data "sse_application" "facebook" {
  name = "Facebook"
}

output "facebook_details" {
  value = data.sse_application.facebook
}

output "facebook_id" {
  value = data.sse_application.facebook.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name (label) of the application to find.

### Read-Only

- `app_type` (String)
- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `label` (String)
